company_context: Attunemen - Translate Your Key Documents, Websites, Ecommerce, Digital Marketing Skip to content Attunemen Menu We are Attuned. | Multilingual. | Digital. | Social. We internationalise brands through languages & digital marketing What We Do Our Partners What you should know About Us We help brands internationalise and expand in multiple countries. Attunemen is digital+translations agency & our core expertise is to develop localised digital marketing touchpoints that help increase your customer base in whichever markets you operate. We help you to speak the language of your customer, and amplify your message by improving your online ranking and visibility, online advertising, and marketing automation which are customised for your business & markets. Our unique blend of digital+translations makes us the partner of choice for brands looking to grow either digitally, or globally, or both. And we simply love developing our own in-house technology to help us become better at what we do. Industries served Automotive . Banking . E-Commerce . FMCG . Healthcare . Legal . Manufacturing . Market Research . Retail . Software/Technology . Travel/Hospitality Insights to our Expertise & Services Industry Expert Translators We manage our resource hub of 9000+ validated, professional translators across 70+ languages, and assign them to your projects based on their proven translation expertise for your industry. Functional Expertise Marketing collateral, legal documents, financial statements, press releases, HR materials, quality certs. We have translated for just about any functional area, across the multiple industries we serve. Website Translation We help re-engineer WordPress websites to make them translation-ready. Translation of WordPress websites (and other CMS), landing pages, SEO & meta tags, EDMs/E-newsletters, Youtube/Vimeo videos, etc … Marketplace & Ecommerce Set buyers at ease and boost online sales. We translate product listings for international sellers on Lazada, Amazon, Qoo10 and more. We also translate your Woocommerce, Opencart and Prestashop ecommerce … International SEO A well-ranked English website, does little for global audiences, as most do not search in English. Through I-SEO, we help global users find your site while searching via local languages and terms. Online Advertising We strategise and customise online advertising campaigns, that help drive target audiences to your business, through online channels such as search engines and various social media. Social Media Marketing Active social media profiles yield brand confidence and gain mindshare. We inject activity into your social outlets, via content creation, and management of your global social media accounts. Analytics A key benefit of digital marketing is the ability to measure results and allocate budgets based on performance. At Attunemen, we drive analytics so that you achieve full transparency. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like Attunemen streamline their data management and gain valuable insights. I came across your company and was impressed with the work you're doing in multilingual digital marketing. Can I have a few minutes to discuss how our solution can benefit your business?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Ah, another data processing solution. What makes you think we need something like that? We've been managing our data just fine so far.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your skepticism, but from what I've researched, Attunemen is growing rapidly and expanding into multiple countries. That often means dealing with a large amount of diverse data, which can be challenging to manage and analyze. Our solution, DeepData AI, can help automate data processing, reduce errors, and provide actionable insights to support your business decisions. We've had success with similar companies in the past, and I'd love to explore how we can help Attunemen.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (concerned about price) I'm not sure we have the budget for another tool right now. We're already investing in various marketing and translation software. How does your pricing compare to what we're currently using?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand budget constraints are a top priority. However, our solution is designed to save you money in the long run by increasing efficiency and reducing manual data processing errors. We offer a customized pricing plan based on your specific needs, and I'd be happy to discuss this further with you. In fact, one of our existing clients in the marketing industry saw a 30% reduction in data processing costs after implementing DeepData AI. Would you be open to exploring how our solution can provide a similar ROI for Attunemen?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (objection about integration) That sounds interesting, but we have a complex tech stack. I'm not sure if your solution would integrate seamlessly with our existing tools. We can't afford to have our workflows disrupted.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concern about integration. DeepData AI is designed to be highly adaptable and can integrate with a wide range of tools and systems. We've worked with companies that have complex tech stacks and have successfully integrated our solution without disrupting their workflows. We also offer dedicated support to ensure a smooth onboarding process. I'd like to offer a demo of our solution to show you how it can work with your existing tools and address any specific integration concerns you may have.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (considering) Alright, I have to admit, I'm intrigued by what you've shared. But I'm still not sure if this is the right time for us to implement a new solution. We're in the middle of a few critical projects and I don't want to add to the workload.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your timing concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. Implementing a new solution does require some upfront time investment, but the long-term benefits can significantly outweigh the initial effort. I'd like to propose a trial or a pilot project to test our solution in a controlled environment, which would allow you to see the benefits firsthand without fully committing to a large-scale implementation. This way, you can assess the impact on your current projects and workflows before deciding on a full rollout.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alright, let's schedule that demo. I'd like to see how DeepData AI can integrate with our existing tools and understand more about the potential ROI. Can you send over some availability for next week?

analysis.raw:
Score: 8
Outcome: Success
Key_Objection: Integration
Feedback: The seller effectively addressed the buyer's concerns, but could further improve by providing more specific examples or case studies to demonstrate the solution's value and integration capabilities earlier in the conversation. Sentiment: Positive
